name: Stuck In A Loop Cafe (Ludum Dare 47)
name_original: Stuck In A Loop Cafe (Ludum Dare 47)
description:
The objective is to reach the goal token with every object and not to touch other moving objects while they repeat your previous movements. You can also rewind time with R to quickly redo your steps. Use mouse wheel to zoom in/out and left mouse click to rotate around

background music made with https://musiclab.chromeexperiments.com/
sound effect with sfxr
